title: Grand Canyon National Park: What's New ?
body: What's New ?                Current Items of Interest:   Read the Park's Latest News Releases Here   Fire Information and Activity Here   Construction Updates Here   Park Publications Here    North Rim of the park open for the 2014 season between May 15 and October 15   Bottled Water in Individual Disposable Containers is no longer sold in the park. Read more          The North Rim of the park is Closed for the Winter The 2015 season begins May 15 and lasts through October 15, 2015    Shuttle bus service on Hermit Road In Service March 1, 2015 through November 30, 2015 When the Hermit Road shuttle is in service, the road is closed to private vehicles.  Commercial bus tours are also available.   South Rim Tusayan Park & Ride: In Service. Out of service Service Resumes May 23, 2015 for the summer.   Changes to Firearm Laws: As of February 22, 2010, a new federal law allows people who can legally possess firearms under applicable federal, state, and local laws, to legally possess firearms in this park.
